Blog.post: * First Off .! MEGGIE .. HAPPY 16TH BIRTHDAY .! HOPE IT WAS A GOOD 'EN .! LOVE YOU SISSIE .. * * Mah computer is fixed now .. Yay .. LoL .. I missed alla yawl .! NOT .. HaHa .. Well a few of yawl .. When I finallie get on mah email an' I have this comment from Hollie .. I thought it was FUNNIE .. I was rollin in da damn floor ova here .. Well not reallie but cha kno wat I mean .. I mite share it wit yawl .. * *Ya know what...I find my own boyfriends. They all came after me...I never went after them...your ex's or anybody elses....I really dont give a damn whether you like me or not. I dont try to mess people's relationships up either. People are bringing me into shit that I dont wanna be in. And I really dont care if I "mess with the wrong person" or not...I do whatever the hell I please...And it sounds to me like you have the problems...tryin to make people feel sorry for you and all that shit sayin how your gonna kill yourself...and to be truthful with you....I dont like you either. I never have....and believe me I do have help...its all in Bobby...that's all the help I need*Later* * Well ta b'gin wit I kno I have problems .. I never said I didn't .. An' I don't want people ta feel sorrie for me .. I jus write wat I feel an' if I wanna kill myself dat day den das wat I write .. An' ta be truthful I reallie ont give a fuck if you like me .. Big deal .. I've never liked you either .. An' I don't care about you an' Bobby .. He is a loser .. An' I could care a less bout tha lil skank .. I'm so glad you are finallie gettin tha help you need .! Bout fuckin time .. Ah .! But fuck alla at shit .. Who care bout stupid shit anymore .. I'm reallie bein serious .. I don't care bout anyone anymore .. Cept a selected few .! An' they shall remain nameless .. HeHe .. Cause they kno who they are I don't needa name 'em .! An' alla da othas dat I can't stand .! Well they kno who they are .. HeHe .. I love an' hate a few but it is all good .! * * Anyway I needa write about mah week .. Shew .! It has been so boring .. I've had all kindz of feelinz for -SUMONE- but -- as of rite now I dunno bout alla at cause he has a g/f which sucks ass big time .. But oh well .. I dunno if I wanna move on or not .. He is jus such a cutie .. An' he is nice an' I like everything about him .. Anyway .. Last nite was freakin KRAZIE .! I jumped offa a bridge .. I broke mah ass .! See Stina jumped down ( but she had done it before.. i hadn't ) an' I was behind a bush .. HeHe .. An' then I said MOVE .! An' I jumped well .. Mah jump didn't go so well cause I fell on all these rocks an' hurt mah butt .. But I get rite up an' start runnin again .. LoL .. We hadda go thru da creek .. We got SOAKED .! We walked home in our panties .. HaHa .. That was so funnie .. Shew .. Me an' Stinie have had sum krazie ass times an' there are so many more ta cum .. OmG .. Did I mention we thought we saw 2 people fuckin .. Lmao .. But we were wrong .. I was like there are 3 of them .. Then we realized what it was .. An' we started laughin .. We laughed da whole nite .! It was so funnie .. HeHe .. Well .. I'm gunna have ta go .. I'll write more later .. Peace Out Homiez .! Love From Tha KRAZIE MANDIE LOU DAT HAS ALL KINDZ OF PROBLEMS .!!! * * Holla Atcha Gurl .! * Betta Watch Out Cause I'm As Krazie As They Cum ..! *

* Well mah puter is messed up til I get a new hard drive .. Shew .. Nuttin has reallie happened ta me .. Jus reallie bored .. I was grounded for a few days cause I didn't clean mah room .. But I cleaned it an' den da puter messed up .. Blah Blah Blah .. Me an' Stinie Jo are bout ta go find sumthin ta get into .. SO we will be back later wit more .. HeHe .. Luv Ya .!

* Well .. I decided ta make one of these .. I guess I'll still write in mah blurty .. I dunno yet .. I'm kinda bored .. Bout ta go ta bed cause it is after 3 o'clock .. Man I am so confused about things rite now .. Everything changed da otha nite .. Never have I felt da way I did when I kissed sumone til I kissed -Him- .. Shew .. An' I have no clue wat ta do bout this .. I really do like him .. Ah .! I guess I jus need help .. LoL .. Well I guess I'll write when I wake up .. Luv Ya .! * *

Well I havent wrote n lyk foreva .. Wats everyone been doin .?! I've been busy here lately an' I reallie dunno wat Ive been doin .. HaHa .. Well lets see .. -- Monday -- - Lets see .. I didnt do much of anythin .. I slept all day an' then got up an' got on da computer .. Talked ta *Chaddy* .. He is so great .. I dunno wat I'd do wit out him .. Anyway .. My dad killed a snake .. It wasnt all at big tho .. My day was boring lyk always .. - -- Tuesday -- - Hmm .. Slept til like 2 or sumthin .. An' helped my mom cook .. Hadda take mah MaMaw sum food .. Came bak an' talked ta mah sisters boyfran .. Then I came n da house an' watched tv an' mom came runnin in da house an' told me ta go get a gun .. So I went runnin ta mah dads room an' got his gun an' gave it ta Danny (das Angels b/f) .. It was a rattle snake .. He shot it rite in da head .! I went out dere an' picked it up cuz nobody else wuz gon' do it .. Dey all called me krazie .. ! Well thank ya .! I kno dat Im krazie .. HeHe .. It was lyk 46 inches .. Dat aint dat big eitha .. But shew .. It cudda killed mah doggiez .! Of course I talked ta *Chaddy* I try ta talk ta him every day .. He is '-my sweetheart-' .! Any way .. Dat day was kinda boring .. An' I got in a bad bad mood .! But everything changed .. Den I went ta bed - -- Wednesday -- - Hmm .. Wat did I do .?! I reallie kant member .. Oh yeah .. Its all cummin bak ta me now .. LoL .. I hadda go to da store fo' mah mom .. I wore mah skirt an' I thought I looked kinda cute .. LoL .. People were lookin at me funnie .! May'b I had sumthin on mah face .!? I doubt it .. I guess dey thought I looked weird or sumthin .! Aww .. Thanks but do yew thank I give a fuck bout wat alla yawl thank bout me .. Dey ont even kno me .. Ont guess dey have heard da ole' sayin -Ont judge a book by its cover- .. But ats fine .. Ery one b judgen me .. Go ahead b'coz onli a few kno da real Mandie Lou an' guess wat dey all lyk me for me .! Das why I lyk *Chaddy* b'coz he likes me for me .! Kan ya believe at .. HaHa .. Well dat day was over .. LoL .. - -- Taday -- - Hmm .. Well I got up an' hadda help mah mom clean .. Oh wat fun .. But I have ta be good an' do wat she says b'cuz I wanna go ta Stinie Jos next weekend .! We are gunna have such a good tym if ery thang works out .. But Im not gunna talk about it .. I've talked ta *Chaddy* sum taday .. I was so mad at mah mom an' dad .. Dey made me ride da four wheeler in da rain .. EWW .! I didn't wanna get sick or nuttin ya kno ..?! Angel tells me a story dat sum gurl told her at work .. She was in Wal-Mart bath room an' she said dat sumone wrote sum where dat 'AMANDA RAY IS A GAY FAG' WTF .!? I'm not a gay fag .. A fag is a guy .! I'm not a gurl .. I'm 100% WOMAN .! Stupid bitches needa stop haten on me .. Gah Damn Motha Fuckaz Ont Kno Who Dey B Messin Wit Im A Krazie Bitch .. HaHa .. Jus playin .. But fo' serious bitches say it ta mah gah damn face PLEASE so I kan knock da shit outta ya .! Thanks Das All I Have Ta Say .. - - I'll try an' write more .. May'b Ill have tym .! - - I Like You A Whole Lot Chaddy .! - - Krazie Bitches .! - - i'll write bout everything dat jus happened tamorrow cuz i'm tryin ta download yahoo messenger rite now .! - - Mandie -

♥ I'm still so tired .! I had such a long nite .! I went to da Fair wit mah Mom an' Shyann .. Mom wated me an' Stina ta take Shyann on da slide an' stuff so we did .. It was funnie .. Shyann had a good time .. I'm happie cause I wanted her ta have fun .. They stayed til like 9:30 or sumthin .. Then me an' Stina walked 'round .. We saw Chaddy .. He gave me a lil stuffed animal .! Aww it was so cute I loved it .. He is such a sweetie .. We walked 'round wit him an' sum otha guys for tha rest of da nite .. Me an' Chaddy rode sumthin tagether .. Stina rode wit Matt .. We all hadda good time .. Me an' Chaddy were like so quiet .. LoL .. I'm kinda shy 'round him .. I thought I was over that but I guess not .. HeHe .. We walked around forever .. Then we were gunna walk ta Chaddy's jeep an' sum sum gurlz started sayin stuff .. I dunno if they was talkin bout both of us or jus Stina .. I mean I could care a less wat dey thank bout me .. Fuck 'em .. They aint even worth gettin mad over .. Finally it was 12 an' we gotta go home .! Thank God .. Mah feet was hurtin so bad .. ♥ ♥ I saw all kinds of people at da Fair .. Sum friends an' sum people that I kant stand .. Oh .. I saw Hollie an' Bobby .. HA .! Thas sum funnie shit right dere .. I was sittin here earlier talkin ta mah momma an' I said man I was so dumb .! He is so ugly .. Wat was I thinkin .. Lmao .. I was messed up I guess .. Ta think dat he cud ever care 'bout me an' dat he was bein tru .. Please .. He -THINKS- he is a playa .. His game is weak if ya ask me ..An' I reallie ont care wat he says bout me now or wat anyone says bout me .. Cause guess wat I don't give a fuck bout ne of yawl at talk bout me .! Cause I LOVE me an' I don't need you ta love me .. I have all da friends I need an' dey all love me .! An' for once I'm jus happie ta be here an' be alive .. I've wanted ta kill mahself so many times but rite now I'm happie .. I mean who wouldn't be .. Sumone likes me for jus bein me .. An' he is such a special guy .. He has been dere for me thru alot of tha shit das been goin on .. He has listened ta me complain an' everything .. LoL .. But I'm gunna go for now .. I mite write later .. Luv Yawl .! Well summa yawl dat is .! ♥ ♥ M a n d i e ♥ ♥ L o u ♥

- ' Well .. I'm sittin here eatin sum soup an' thinkin .. I went to da Fair an' I had sum fun .. But now I have a problem .. I dunno what is wrong wit me .. Jus lookin at you one time brought all of those feelings right back .. I jus dunno bout boys they like to play games .. I don't wanna play anymore games .. I wanna find mah right guy .. The one I'm pose to be wit .. But I dunno if there is ever a right guy for me .. No guy will ever understand me or wanna be with me .. Cause they are always gunna find sum prettier gurl or sumone who will do more for them .. I mean seriously is it possible for sum guy ta love me .?! Casue I'm beginning ta think that it's not .. I mean I kno we are all pose ta have this perfect guy well where is mine .?! I think he died or sumthin .. LoL .. But .. I mean I'm tired of jus bein a guyz friend ..! I want sumthin real .. I want someone I can call mah own .. How long am I gunna have ta wait .?! It better not be forever either .. Cause I don't have forever .. Well right now I'm talkin ta dis guy on da puter .. He is a nice guy .. I've known him for like 2 days .. LoL .. He is kool .. Shew .. I'm tired .. LoL .. I guess I'm gunna go for now .. I'll write more lata .! Luv Ya .! * M a n d i e L o u *

* Shew .! Wat ta say .. LoL .. Yesterday was one of those -BAD- days .. I was doin alot of thinkin an' alot of writen how i felt .. Talkin bout it helps me an' writen bout it does too .. So now I'm still thinkin bout everything that is happenin in mah life an' tryin ta figure out wat I can do ta make it better .. But I reallie ont kno wat ta do as of now .. I hurt .. But oh well I'll be okay .. I'm reallie bored .. Mah power went off taday .. But it finallie came bak on .. I painted mah MaMaws porch taday too .. Shyann fell offa da steps .. She cried .. Then me an' her went walkin .. Mah day has been reallie -BORING- .. Well .. I dunno as of now when I'm goin to da Fair .. I kno I'm not goin a nite it's gunna rain .. So .. Who knos .. Who cares .. Not me .. I'm reallie gunna start bein happie .. Well .. I'm gunna try .. Thas all I kan do reallie .. So .. How has everyone been doin .?! Nobody cept Stinie Jo leave me comments .. LoL .. Awl .! I Have - no friends - Ah .! It's all good .. Well .. Rite now I'm kinda sad .. I dunno why .. It's jus gunna be one of those weeks I can alreadie tell .. Maybe I'll have sum fun when I go to da Fair .. - HOPEFULLY - .. I reallie don't have much ta say rite now .. I'm jus sittin here doin sum thingz .. Well I'm gunna go .. I'll write more lata .! Luv Ya .!
